title: 661-C
statement: C. Array Sumtime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test64 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are given an array of integers. Calculate the sum of its elements.InputThei-th line of the input contains an integerai(0 ≤a≤ 1000) — thei-th element of the array. The size of the array is between 1 and 10, inclusive. Note that the size of the array is not given explicitly!OutputOutput a single integer — the sum of the elements of the array.ExamplesInput2151103Output130Input9002133145Output487

processed.result:
You are given a list of numbers. Calculate the total sum of all the numbers in the list. 

The numbers will be given one per line. The list can have between 1 and 10 numbers. 

Output the total sum of the numbers.
Calculate the total of a list of numbers. The list's length is between 1 and 10.
